com.MAVLink.common

Class msg_heartbeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.MAVLink.Messages.MAVLinkMessage
      • com.MAVLink.common.msg_heartbeat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class msg_heartbeat
extends MAVLinkMessage
    The heartbeat message shows that a system is present and responding. The type of the MAV and Autopilot hardware allow the receiving system to treat further messages from this system appropriate (e.g. by laying out the user interface based on the autopilot).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      short autopilot
      Autopilot type / class.
      short base_mode
      System mode bitfield, see MAV_MODE_FLAG ENUM in mavlink/include/mavlink_types.h
      long custom_mode
      A bitfield for use for autopilot-specific flags.
      static int MAVLINK_MSG_ID_HEARTBEAT 
      static int MAVLINK_MSG_LENGTH 
      short mavlink_version
      MAVLink version, not writable by user, gets added by protocol because of magic data type: uint8_t_mavlink_version
      short system_status
      System status flag, see MAV_STATE ENUM
      short type
      Type of the MAV (quadrotor, helicopter, etc., up to 15 types, defined in MAV_TYPE ENUM)
